titles.title: To provide for the issuance of a noncompetitive oil and gas lease for certain lands.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.

bill.summary: 9/19/1996--Introduced. Requires the Secretary of the Interior to issue a noncompetitive oil and gas lease to a named individual for certain lands, notwithstanding the location of a Known Geologic Structure within such area.
